project-notes: MCP Backpack - a persistent key-value memory MCP server. Python 3.14, uses diskcache + FastMCP. Single module at src/mcp_backpack/server.py. Run with `uv run mcp-backpack`. Storage lives in .backpack_memory/ per project. Export/import via backpack.json for git portability.
session:latest_summary: Completed all 7 review items, published v0.1.2 to PyPI. Works on Mac and Linux but MCP won't connect on Windows. Next: debug Windows connection issue live on a Windows machine.
task:next_steps:
1. **Debug Windows MCP connection issue** - server won't connect on Windows. Possible causes: stdio encoding, entry point resolution, or client invocation differences. Test live on Windows machine.
2. Commit version bump (0.1.2) and .gitignore update, push to origin.
